channel.title: DeFi on Going the distance
channel.description: Recent content in DeFi on Going the distance

item.title: Analysis of the TITAN fall
item.description: Photo by Sigmund on Unsplash Introduction This is an analysis of an incident that happened to Iron.Finance on June 16, 2021. As a result of the incident, the price of TITAN token has collapsed to 0 and the IRON stablecoin has lost its peg to USD and hasn’t regained it yet. There are already multple reports on the incident ( one, two, three ). While these are good attempts, they didn’t answer the only question that inerested me: what part of the design has failed?
